Factsheet

Description

Doggonaut is a fast action/puzzle game for mobile where the player takes control of the brave doggonauts, a group of doggos going after space cookies.

History

Doggonaut

Doggonaut is the first published game by Sukafu Team for mobile platforms, what are you waiting to jump in and live this spacial adventure?

Features

  • FAST ACTION: With simple controls the game is easy to pick up but hard to master.
  • +60 STAGES: All the stages are handcrafted for the best challenge and level design.
  • ONLINE HIGHSCORE: Compare your time and stars with facebook friends in the stage based highscore.
  • GROUP YOUR CREW: There are 8 skins with different dog races and from different countries.
  • PICK YOUR DIFFICULTY: The game has three different stage packs for different players. "Basic", "Advanced" and "Harcore" stages, can you beat them all?
  • CHALLENGING STAGES: Prepare yourself for tough obstacles that the doggonauts will find in their journey
